thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com | 3 of 92
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
I purchased some starter equipment from ScreenPrinting.com. It all works as advertised, and I'm happy with it. A few weeks later, I ordered some additional emulsion (a pint is not enough for a rank beginner!).
The shipment didn't arrive when expected. After an email to the support, the agent determined that something wasn't right. He immediately resent the package (I never got the first instance). Although I was disappointed to lose a weekend waiting for the first shipment, I was satisfied that they quickly solved the issue.
Later on, I ordered some additional equipment, which arrived very promptly, with no issues.
